name: Video Controls Skin - Black-Gloss
description:
Changes the appearance of the open audio/video player controls in Firefox.

Update:
The time duration label text (large 2:51 in the screen shot) has been changed from 16px to 12px.


Visit http://www.accessfirefox.org/Firefox-Media-Control-Skins.php for better screen shots.

Also see:
Chrome-ish Controls
http://userstyles.org/styles/19075
Hi-Vis-Light Controls
http://userstyles.org/styles/19073

user.name: Ken-Saunders
user.about: Get Stylish Tools for Firefox. Quicker access to several Stylish features through a toolbar button and/or keyboard shortcuts. Available for Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey. Stylish Tools provides quicker access to the following Stylish features. 1. Write New Style Access through the toolbar button or through Ctrl + Alt + U 2. Manage Styles This allows you to manage your userstyles in a tab and not through Add-ons Manager > Stylish. The difference is that It loads much quicker. Access through the toolbar button or through Ctrl + Alt + M In Thunderbird, access is only available through the toolbar button. 3.Write style for... (this URL, etc) Access through the toolbar button. About Ken Saunders
